verses.text: Ephraim herds \w the|strong="H5437"\w* wind \w and|strong="H3063"\w* hunts \w the|strong="H5437"\w* sirocco. \w All|strong="H5437"\w* day \w long|strong="H5750"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* heap up falsehood \w and|strong="H3063"\w* fraud, \w make|strong="H5437"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* treaty \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Assyria, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* sends tribute \w of|strong="H1004"\w* olive oil \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Egypt.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w has|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* charge \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w bring|strong="H2986"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* Israel, \w to|strong="H3117"\w* punish Jacob \w for|strong="H4714"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* acts, according \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w deeds|strong="H4714"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* requite \w him|strong="H5973"\w*,

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* womb \w he|strong="H3068"\w* supplanted \w his|strong="H3068"\w* brother, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* manhood \w he|strong="H3068"\w* wrestled \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*,

He \w wrestled|strong="H8280"\w* \w with|strong="H8280"\w* the angel and prevailed, he wept and sought \w his|strong="H6117"\w* blessing. At Bethel the \nd Lord\nd* found him, and there he spoke \w with|strong="H8280"\w* us.

\w And|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* 
d Lord
d* \w is|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w God|strong="H1008"\w* \w of|strong="H4397"\w* hosts, \w the|strong="H1696"\w* 
d Lord
d* \w is|strong="H8033"\w* \w his|strong="H4672"\w* name!

So now, \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* help \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, return. Keep \w true|strong="H3068"\w* love \w and|strong="H3068"\w* justice. Trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* without ceasing.
\w A|strong="H3068"\w* merchant uses false scales: They \w love|strong="H2617"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* defraud.

Ephraim says, ‘Yes, \w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w become|strong="H3027"\w* rich, \w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* secured wealth \w for|strong="H3027"\w* myself. But despite \w my|strong="H3027"\w* gains no \w one|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* find \w a|strong="H3068"\w* crime \w I|strong="H3027"\w* can \w be|strong="H3027"\w* convicted \w of|strong="H3027"\w*!’

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w ever|strong="H3808"\w* since \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Egypt. \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* make \w you|strong="H3605"\w* again dwell \w in|strong="H4672"\w* tents, \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* days \w of|strong="H3605"\w* old.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* spoke \w continually|strong="H3117"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* prophets. \w It|strong="H3117"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* multiplied visions, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* spoke \w in|strong="H3427"\w* parables through \w the|strong="H3068"\w* prophets.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* Gilead \w is|strong="H3027"\w* iniquity, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* come \w to|strong="H1696"\w* nothing. \w In|strong="H5921"\w* Gilgal \w they|strong="H5921"\w* sacrifice bulls, \w so|strong="H1696"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* altars \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w as|strong="H1696"\w* stone heaps, \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* furrows \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* field.

\w And|strong="H4196"\w* Jacob fled \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w territory|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* Aram, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* Israel worked \w to|strong="H1961"\w* earn \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w he|strong="H5921"\w* herded sheep.

\w The|strong="H5647"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w brought|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* up \w from|strong="H3478"\w* Egypt \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* prophet, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* prophet \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w guarded|strong="H8104"\w*.

Ephraim \w has|strong="H3068"\w* given bitter provocation. \w His|strong="H8104"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w leave|strong="H5927"\w* \w upon|strong="H5927"\w* \w him|strong="H5927"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* guilt \w of|strong="H3068"\w* bloodshed, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w for|strong="H4714"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* contempt \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* repay \w him|strong="H5927"\w*.
